name: Biogenetic Law
description:
This is text based interactive fiction based on the theme: "Out of control."

It was made in 48 hours for the GMTK2020 game jam.

The system, music, and story were made only for this Game Jam.

During a routine inspection you have discovered horrible tempering with teleportation equipment, the ramifications of which are beyond your current understanding.

We hope you like it! :)
